name: TheConspiracyTheoryEscapeRoom
0:
”Alexa, open the conspiracy theory”
”Alexa, open the conspiracy theory and Inspect the room”
”Alexa, play the conspiracy theory”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the conspiracy theory
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to the Conspiracy Theory. It's up to you to discover where the cover up ends and the conspiracy begins.

The first game of the series, Moon Landing, revolves around the space explorations spearheaded by the Russians and Americans in the 1950s-1960s

Your story begins at a federal building where a tipster has informed you that the missing Apollo 11 moon landing tapes are hidden. You are an investigator who wants to recover and analyze these tapes, missing for over 40 years. A security guard will let you in the building, but the rest is up to you.

You can use commands like 'look around the room' to explore while trying to complete your mission. Have you got what it takes to find the truth?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
